emptyBaseValue: The facility prefix cannot be empty.
emptyFacilityName: The facility name cannot be empty.
emptyLiteralName: The literal definition cannot be empty.
emptyPrefixValue: The facility prefix cannot be empty.
tooLongFacilityName: The facility name can be up to 9 characters.
tooLongFacilityPrefix: The maximum length of an alternate symbol prefix created with the /PREFIX qualifier is 9 characters.
tooLongMessageName: The combined length of the prefix and the message symbol name cannot exceed 31 characters.
